items.sentence: Tom slammed on the brakes so he wouldn\'t hit the dog.
There\'s very fine a line between genius and insanity.
Is there anyone here who can explain what\'s going on?
I thought Tom and Mary would have forgotten me by now.
I thought Tom would at least understand the situation.
I\'ll try, but I\'m not sure I\'ll be able to do that.
I just need to talk to Tom, and then I\'m out of here.
Tom gave Mary all the money that he had in his pocket.
Tom gave me something I really wanted for my birthday.
It\'s time to get started with the Christmas shopping.
